title: "Fangtastic" Slot from NuWorks Arrives at Lucky Club Casino Just in Time for Halloween
text:
"Fangtastic" Slot from NuWorks Arrives at Lucky Club Casino Just in Time for Halloween
Willlemstad, Curacao, October 17, 2015 --( PR.com )-- This week metro-style Lucky Club Casino (http://www.luckyclub.eu) introduces a spooky new Halloween slot from NuWorks called Fangtastic. Players can claim a casino bonus up to $200 and get 66 free spins to try the new vampire-themed slot game.
Fangtastic Casino Bonus
100% up to $200
Includes 66 free spins
Coupon code: FANGTASTIC66
Valid until October 31, 2015 only.
Flaming Dice trigger up to 66 free spins with a 30X win multiplier. The total of the triggering dice determines the number of free spins. They are then rolled again to determine the win multiplier for the free spins.
There are three random jackpots that can be hit after any spin.
“This is the coolest Halloween casino game I’ve seen in a long time,” said Lucky Club manager Alex Hunter. “I love its fangalicious vampire character. And with win multipliers up to 30X, I think its bonus feature is going to be paying some major wins!”
Lucky Club Casino has dozens of unique games from Nuworks Gaming and welcomes new players from all over the world with an up to $1444 match bonus. Details about this and other bonus offers are available at: http://www.luckyclub.eu/promotions.
View this casino news story on YouTube: https://youtu.be/MneiVI-iYlk
